string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC001
string_tip.body: Tip: You do not lose Experience Points when you are killed by a player in the Arena or PvP.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC002
string_tip.body: Lore: Lady Siel was the Empyrean Lord of Time. When the Tower shattered,\nSiel gave her life force to prevent the hollow sphere of Atreia from scattering into space.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC003
string_tip.body: Hint: New skills can be learned automatically depending on your level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC004
string_tip.body: Tip: Access Help by pressing the <H> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC005
string_tip.body: Hint: From Level 50 onwards, you will lose XP if you die.\nSome of the lost XP can be restored by the soul healer next to the Obelisks.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC006
string_tip.body: Tip: To change where you resurrect when you die, bind to an Obelisk.\nTo find nearby Obelisks type "/where obelisk".

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC007
string_tip.body: Tip: The Abyss is a PvPvE area available to characters of Level 25 and higher.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC008
string_tip.body: Tip: To link information on an item, quest, or skill in Chat, Ctrl-Right-Click the item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC009
string_tip.body: Lore: Lady Ariel leads the Seraphim Lords. Before the Cataclysm,\nAriel supported Israphel's call for peace. Now, the Lady of Light watches over Elysea.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC010
string_tip.body: Lore: Lord Azphel opposed peace with the Balaur.\nAs Lord of Shadows, he leads the Shedim Lords protecting Asmodae.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC011
string_tip.body: Tip: To view their class, level, and other information, Click the names of other characters in chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC012
string_tip.body: Tip: To see how items would look on your character, Ctrl-Click the item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC013
string_tip.body: Lore: Devotees of Lady Yustiel, the Seraphim Lord of Life, work tirelessly\nhoping to restore Eltnen to its former glory as the breadbasket of Elysea.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC014
string_tip.body: Tip: Toggle auto-run by pressing <NumLock>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC015
string_tip.body: Lore: The Empyrean Lord of Space, Israphel, argued for peace talks with the Balaur.\nWhen the Empyrean Lords met with the Dragon Lords, the ensuing Cataclysm destroyed Lord Israphel, Lady Siel, and the Tower.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC016
string_tip.body: Tip: Cities and many towns have mailboxes where you can send and receive mail.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC017
string_tip.body: Tip: Falling from a great height will cause you to suffer damage, or even to die.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC018
string_tip.body: Tip: You can ascend as a Daeva and choose a sub-class when you reach Level 10.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC019
string_tip.body: Tip: The green gauge around the Fly button (wings icon) displays your remaining flying time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC020
string_tip.body: Tip: Daevas can glide by pressing the <Space Bar> in the middle of a jump.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC021
string_tip.body: Tip: Zones that are extremely populated may have more than one zone channel. Group members need to be in the same channel.\nChange your channel number in Menu/Support/Change Channel.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC022
string_tip.body: Tip: The Fly button (wings icon) toggles flight. Mousing over it shows flight controls,\nremaining fly time, or how long until you can unfurl your wings again.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC023
string_tip.body: Tip: Aggressive monsters and characters of the opposing faction are displayed as red dots on the Compass.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC024
string_tip.body: Tip: Whisper back to the last person who sent you a Whisper by pressing <T>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC025
string_tip.body: Tip: Check the box in the Quest Window to load a quest to the Quest Tracker.\nQuest Tracker allows you to monitor your quest progress from the User Interface while playing.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC026
string_tip.body: Tip: Click blue words in quests to bring up a dictionary definition with more detailed information.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC027
string_tip.body: Tip: The Menu button at the bottom of the screen offers access to many useful windows.\nDefault <F10> key for Menu.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC028
string_tip.body: Tip: Group Leaders can display brands on targets by right-clicking the Target, by typing "/Brand #" in chat,\nor by right-clicking the Show Brand Action in the Skills window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC029
string_tip.body: Tip: You can press 'B' to activate or deactivate the equipped Shards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC030
string_tip.body: Tip: Find NPCs or locations by typing "/where CharacterName" in chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC031
string_tip.body: Tip: To view both the map and the game screen at the same time, use the transparent overlay.\nDefault <N> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC032
string_tip.body: Tip: To mark locations on your map and link to them in chat, Ctrl-Right-Click on the map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC033
string_tip.body: Tip: Right-Clicking a location mark you've made on the map opens a pop-up menu with additional features.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC034
string_tip.body: Lore: Lord Israphel was the Empyrean Lord of Space.\nHe lost his life, along with Lady Siel, when the Tower shattered.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC035
string_tip.body: Tip: When your craft skill is maxed out for your skill level, talk to a crafting master to access the next level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC036
string_tip.body: Tip: To view current Legion or Character rankings, first click the Influence Ratio icon on the bottom right of the screen, then the Abyss Rank button.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC037
string_tip.body: Tip: Legions can only be created or disbanded by visiting the Legions Board in Pandaemonium or Sanctum.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC038
string_tip.body: Tip: Moving during combat can increase your defence or attack.\nOn-screen arrows indicate the current active bonuses.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC039
string_tip.body: Tip: Up to three additional Quickbars, as well as a floating Quickbar, are available in Game Options.\nDefault <O> key for Options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC040
string_tip.body: Tip: Fortresses and cities have warehouses where you can store spare items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC041
string_tip.body: Tip: All characters from one account share an account warehouse.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC042
string_tip.body: Tip: Expand your Cube (inventory) space by visiting a cube artisan.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED001
string_tip.body: Tip: Rifts are corridors to enemy territory. There is a limit on the number of characters who can travel through a rift.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED002
string_tip.body: Tip: Toggle the altitude lock while flying by pressing Scroll Lock.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED003
string_tip.body: Tip: To copy character, item, or location information from chat to your Memo Pad, Right-Click the information.\nNavigate to your Memo Pad through Menu/Community.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED004
string_tip.body: Tip: Capturing a fortress in the Abyss temporarily boosts the abilities of all members of the conquering faction.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED005
string_tip.body: Tip: Significant differences in Influence will give a PvP boost to the disadvantaged faction.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED006
string_tip.body: Tip: Fortresses and cities have Abyss Distributors where you can spend Abyss Points on armour and weapons.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED007
string_tip.body: Tip: You can consume food and beverages at the same time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED008
string_tip.body: Tip: At Level 20, you can take quests to become qualified to equip Stigma Stones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED009
string_tip.body: Hint: An item's rank is displayed as follows – white for Normal, green for Superior, blue for Heroic, yellow for Fabled, orange for Eternal and violet for Mythical.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED010
string_tip.body: Tip: You can use this to change the appearance of an item in the Modify Appearance menu under [Boost/Modify].

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED011
string_tip.body: Tip: Enhancing your weapon with Godstones requires a visit to a Godstone Socketer in the city.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED012
string_tip.body: Lore: The Seraphim Lord Nezekan carries Izith, the shield of mystery. He is known for his fair yet swift Justice.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED013
string_tip.body: Tip: When a quest marker appears as a sunburst, that NPC has a reward waiting for you.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED014
string_tip.body: Tip: To toggle the camera view to face your character, click the scroll wheel.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED015
string_tip.body: Tip: You can equip two weapon sets.\nDefault <Shift-Z> to switch between them.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED016
string_tip.body: Lore: Zikel demonstrated his title as the Shedim Lord of Destruction when the Elyos Storm Legion attacked Asmodae.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED017
string_tip.body: Tip: You don't have to get to a mailbox to read Express Mail.\nJust click the Express Package Icon next to your Compass.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED018
string_tip.body: Lore: Favoured by Asmodian Assassins, Lady Triniel is dispassionate\nand unsurprisingly, as the Shedim Lord of Death, fatal.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED019
string_tip.body: Tip: Cycle through nearby targets by pressing <Tab>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED020
string_tip.body: Tip: The number of dots on the left of the Target Window indicates the difficulty of the monster.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED021
string_tip.body: Tip: Some hard-to-find NPCs wander about, rather than remaining in one spot.\nAlso, some hard-to-find NPCs only appear at specific times.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED022
string_tip.body: Tip: View the current status of the Abyss War by selecting the Abyss on the map.\nDefault <M> key for the Map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED023
string_tip.body: Tip: When a Legion reaches Level 3, they can design and register their own Legion emblem.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED024
string_tip.body: Tip: DP does not reset until the character has been logged off for 5 minutes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED025
string_tip.body: Tip: Well-timed attacks can interrupt an enemy's skills or spells.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED026
string_tip.body: Tip: Altered States may cause you to become temporarily immobilized or unable to fight.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED027
string_tip.body: Tip: Altered States such as Bleeding or Poisoned will cause you to suffer periodic damage.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED028
string_tip.body: Lore: Vaizel, Lord of Freedom, is said to spend more time with Humans than the other Seraphim Lords.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED029
string_tip.body: Tip: Spiritmasters can issue commands to spirits by using the Command buttons next to the Quickbar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED030
string_tip.body: Tip: When you use an item to transform into an animal, you will usually not be able to use any skills.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED031
string_tip.body: Tip: Dredgions are more likely to take interest in the faction with the higher Influence Ratio.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED032
string_tip.body: Tip: Artefacts play an important strategic role in Fortress Battles.\nYou can see who possesses an Artefact on the Abyss map. Default <M> key for the Map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED033
string_tip.body: Tip: You can earn Abyss Points with Fortress Battles, or by hunting monsters in the Abyss.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED034
string_tip.body: Lore: Lady Lumiel, Shedim Lord of Wisdom, insulted Lord Kaisinel hundreds of years ago.\nThe Seraphim Lord of Illusion still holds a grudge against her.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED035
string_tip.body: Tip: Teleporting is more expensive in the Abyss when a Fortress Battle is in progress there.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED036
string_tip.body: Lore: Shedim Lord Marchutan is the Asmodian Lord of Fate, and the Lord generally associated with Asmodian Chanters.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED037
string_tip.body: Tip: The Aetheric Field of a fortress protects it from attacks from above and below.\nThis protection is lost when the Aetheric Field Generator is destroyed.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED038
string_tip.body: Tip: Enchantment Stones, Manastones, and Godstones permanently enhance weapons or armour.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED039
string_tip.body: Tip: If you have armour or weapons you no longer want, you can create Enchantment Stones by using extraction tools.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED040
string_tip.body: Tip: You can extract high level Enchantment stones from high rank items.\nHigher level Enchantment stones have a higher success rate.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED041
string_tip.body: Tip: A failed enchantment attempt weakens previous enchantments on that item by 1 level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED042
string_tip.body: Tip: To use a Godstone to strengthen an item, visit a Godstone Socketer.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED043
string_tip.body: Tip: Soul Bound items cannot be sold or traded to other characters, but can be sold to merchants.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED044
string_tip.body: Tip: To divide multiple items, Shift-Double-Click the item stack.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED045
string_tip.body: Tip: A critical success during crafting will result in a better crafted item, which will have better bonuses.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED046
string_tip.body: Tip: Increase your crafting skills faster by completing Work Orders.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED047
string_tip.body: Tip: Players can type "/dice" or "/roll" to make random decisions.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED048
string_tip.body: Tip: Group Leaders can choose to divide loot by having members roll dice or bid on items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED049
string_tip.body: Tip: Grey items are junk, and only of value to merchants.\nSell all junk items at once by clicking <Sell all Misc> in the merchant's Sell Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED050
string_tip.body: Tip: Trade Brokers allow you to buy or sell items on consignment.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED051
string_tip.body: Tip: Once your Legion is Level 2 or higher, you can use the Legion Item Merchant.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED052
string_tip.body: Tip: You can attach items or Kinah to mail that you send.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED053
string_tip.body: Tip: When mail arrives for you, a letter icon will appear next to the Compass. To read regular mail, go to a mailbox.\nTo find the nearest mailbox type "/where mailbox" in chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED054
string_tip.body: Tip: Use the Auto Arrange Inventory button at the bottom of your Cube to sort items by type.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED055
string_tip.body: Tip: Being in water can prevent a Daeva from flying. Deep water can injure or kill characters.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED056
string_tip.body: Tip: Some foods, items, and potions increase the duration of your flying time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED057
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot use items while gliding.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED058
string_tip.body: Tip: Once you become a Daeva, you can use a teleporter to travel to other regions and cities.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED059
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot use items while on a hoverstone.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED060
string_tip.body: Tip: Emotes can liven up your communication with other players.\nDefault <K> key for Skills and Actions.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED061
string_tip.body: Tip: Make your skills, actions, and items more accessible by dragging them to the Quickbars.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED062
string_tip.body: Tip: You can lock the Quickbar slots by clicking the Padlock icon at the left of the Quickbar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED063
string_tip.body: Tip: The user interface can be toggled off for clean screenshots by pressing <F12>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED064
string_tip.body: Tip: To hide all other players on the screen, toggle with <Shift-F12>.\nRemember to toggle it back on or enemy players will remain hidden from you.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED065
string_tip.body: Tip: When your icon on the Compass is magenta, you are at an altitude where you could die if you fall.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED066
string_tip.body: Tip: The <Enter> key opens the Chat Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED067
string_tip.body: Tip: Click and drag the Chat Window tabs to rearrange them, or to put them anywhere on the screen.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED068
string_tip.body: Tip: To send another Whisper to the same person you last sent a Whisper to, press <Tab> while in the Chat Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED069
string_tip.body: Tip: Video Tutorials are available in Beginner Help.\nDefault <H> key for Help.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED070
string_tip.body: Tip: You can see how your class skills chain together in the Chain tab of the Skill Window.\nDefault <K> key for Skills.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED071
string_tip.body: Tip: For easier contact, add friends to your Friends list.\nDefault <V> key for Social.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED072
string_tip.body: Tip: Display the distance to your target in the Combat Info section of Game Options.\nDefault <O> key for Options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED073
string_tip.body: Tip: Set the User Interface to top or bottom in Game Options.\nDefault <O> key for Options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED074
string_tip.body: Tip: Macros allow more convenient access to sequences of actions you perform frequently.\nDefault <U> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED075
string_tip.body: Tip: To auto-follow a targeted group member, Double-Click the Group Window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED076
string_tip.body: Tip: Important hints for quests may appear in NPC dialogues and cutscenes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED077
string_tip.body: Tip: Complete Coin Quests to earn more Coins, which can be exchanged for valuable rare rewards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED078
string_tip.body: Tip: Certain monsters drop items that begin quests.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED079
string_tip.body: Tip: When a monster shouts for help during combat, its companions may join the fight.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED080
string_tip.body: Tip: Monsters with unique names are more powerful, and drop more valuable items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED081
string_tip.body: Tip: NPC allies in enemy bases have more powerful stats and skills than normal monsters.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED082
string_tip.body: Tip: Treasure boxes don't always yield valuable items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED083
string_tip.body: Tip: Some skills cannot be used while flying.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED084
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot request a duel with a player who is in combat or trade.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED085
string_tip.body: Tip: In the Arena, all players outside your group count as enemies.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED086
string_tip.body: Tip: Prices and taxes fluctuate with your faction's Influence Ratio.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED087
string_tip.body: Tip: To know how much time, how many bindings, and how many resurrections remain on a Kisk,\nhover your cursor over the Kisk.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED088
string_tip.body: Tip: Many towns have a Manastone Remover who can remove Manastones from an item so you can add new ones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED089
string_tip.body: Tip: To restore an item's original colour, buy Dye Remover from a city merchant .

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED090
string_tip.body: Tip: Vortices floating in the sky provide Aether for crafting.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED091
string_tip.body: Tip: You increase your Legion's level by earning Abyss Points.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED092
string_tip.body: Tip: You can create a private chat channel for you and your friends.\nType "/channelhelp" to learn more.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED093
string_tip.body: Tip: Open a private store to sell things to other players.\nDefault <Y> key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED094
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot progress with some quests unless you are wearing a specific title.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED095
string_tip.body: Tip: The icon next to the Compass tells you the current time of day.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED096
string_tip.body: Tip: To know when you can capture a fortress or artefact, hover your cursor over its icon on the Abyss map.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED097
string_tip.body: Tip: You can reduce the size of the User Interface and windows in Game Options.\nDefault <O> key for Options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED098
string_tip.body: Tip: Some merchant NPCs may only appear at certain times of day or during events.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED099
string_tip.body: Tip: Test your skills against other players by duelling.\nTo bring up the option to Request Duel, Right-click the player or type "/duel".

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED100
string_tip.body: Tip: You can enable viewing your target's target in the Combat Info section of the Game Options window.\nDefault <O> key for Options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED101
string_tip.body: Tip: To send a whisper to someone, type "/w CharacterName Message" in chat.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC043
string_tip.body: Hint: Use the <H> button to open the help window, where you will find answers to your questions, along with information about the game.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC044
string_tip.body: Tip: Limited Sale Merchant NPCs indicated as [Sold Out] cannot sell particular items until their goods are restocked.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC045
string_tip.body: Tip: Items with a one-per-day limit can't be purchased if their daily limit has been reached, even if the Merchant NPC has not\nindicated it as [Sold Out]. Items will be available for purchase again at a specified time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC046
string_tip.body: Tip: Items marked as "Bundled Material Items" can be split into 3 lower grade material items of the same type.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC047
string_tip.body: Tip: Fusing 2 two-handed weapons enhances its stats and increases its number of Manastone slots.\nYou can combine weapons by visiting the Armsfusion Officer at the remodel shops in large cities.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC048
string_tip.body: Tip: You can obtain a daily quest when you join a special organization. The daily quest is reset at 9:00 AM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED127
string_tip.body: Hint: The insignias that you receive for completing daily quests can be exchanged for a variety of rewards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED128
string_tip.body: Hint: A few merchants loan out items that may only be used for a certain length of time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED129
string_tip.body: Hint: A borrowed item cannot be enhanced using Manastones or Enchantment Stones. It can also not be extracted or sold. It disappears automatically when its usage time expires.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC052
string_tip.body: Tip: Using a supplement increases the success rate of enchanting or Manastone socketing.\nSupplements can be purchased from Potion Suppliers in every village.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC053
string_tip.body: Tip: When enchanting, you must use a supplement that is appropriate for the level of the weapon.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC054
string_tip.body: Tip: You can travel to Balaurea at any time. Use the Aerolink in each city to do so.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC055
string_tip.body: Tip: Balaurea has windstreams, which enable you to travel to your destination faster.\nYou can catch a windstream by gliding into it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC056
string_tip.body: Tip: You can find a group more easily by pressing the <Shift+v> keys or <Start Menu - Find Group> to open the Find Group window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC057
string_tip.body: Tip: Using the info boards in a city allows you to locate an NPC easily.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC058
string_tip.body: Tip: You can find out the wait time remaining for instanced zones\nby using <Start Menu - Instance Info> or the "/CheckEntry" command.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC059
string_tip.body: Tip: You can still check your mail at the Mailbox even when the Express Courier is not there.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC060
string_tip.body: Tip: You can't receive new mail if your Mailbox is full.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC061
string_tip.body: Tip: When using a Trade Broker NPC, right-clicking on one of your items will automatically enter the search word on the Trade Broker window.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED130
string_tip.body: Hint: Once you have reached Level 10, you will be able to use the teleport statues in the towns to travel to the Temple of the Lord.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED102
string_tip.body: Tip: You may only join one organization at a time that gives daily quests.\nTo join another organization, you must leave the current one first.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED103
string_tip.body: Tip: While traveling on a windstream, you may end up exiting by attempting to change your direction or alter your speed.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED104
string_tip.body: Tip: When you defeat certain foes, an ascending air current or geyser may form nearby.\nYou can ride the geyser to a higher elevation by gliding above it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC063
string_tip.body: Tip: When you become a Mentor, you can form a party with characters that are more than 10 levels lower than you.\nYou can't obtain EXP and items while you are Mentor.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED131
string_tip.body: Hint: Pets belonging to other characters will not be shown if you check the box marked 'Hide other players' Pets' under <System settings - Player settings - User interface>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC065
string_tip.body: Hint: You can increase the resolution by checking the box marked 'High quality' under <System settings - Graphics settings - Graphics engine>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED105
string_tip.body: Tip: The slayer penalty you received by killing the opposing race is not applicable to your ally's zone.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED106
string_tip.body: Tip: You cannot use certain skills or items while in some zones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED107
string_tip.body: Tip: You can obtain special weapons and armour from Contributors in the Empyrean Crucible.\nThese items can be Conditioned, and is made stronger depending on its Conditioning level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED108
string_tip.body: Tip: Pets may give you presents when they feel good.\nIf you want to make them feel good, summon them for longer hours or use the <Pet Care> command.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC066
string_tip.body: Hint: You cannot attack the opposing faction in a neutral zone.\nHowever, there are no restrictions in battle zones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC067
string_tip.body: Tip: Watch your back in a disputed zone--your opponents may attack at any time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED109
string_tip.body: Tip: Balaurea Teleporters can only send you to other Balaurea locations.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED110
string_tip.body: Tip: To board the warship, use the special teleport statue in Kamar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC068
string_tip.body: Tip: To enter Tiamaranta's Eye, your race must control 2 or more Hearts of Tiamat's power.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC069
string_tip.body: Tip: If you occupy 3 or more Hearts of Tiamat's power, only your allies can enter Tiamaranta's Eye.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC070
string_tip.body: Tip: Tiamaranta's Eye is a disputed zone, where enemy players may attack.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED111
string_tip.body: Tip: Use a Relationship Crystal to visit a friend's house.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC071
string_tip.body: Hint: If you delete a cabinet, you cannot access the items in it until it has been restored.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC072
string_tip.body: Tip: Cabinets with the same name share items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED112
string_tip.body: Tip: Each character can own no more than one house.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC073
string_tip.body: Tip: Characters Level 21 and higher are eligible for a quest to obtain a studio.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC074
string_tip.body: Tip: Housing auctions begin every Monday and end the following Sunday at noon.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED113
string_tip.body: Tip: To sell your house, you need to visit a Housing Auctioneer.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED114
string_tip.body: Tip: Once you buy a new house, all items inside your previous house will be transferred to the new one.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC075
string_tip.body: Tip: When you enter your house, click the house-shaped icon on the lower half of the screen to begin decorating.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED115
string_tip.body: Tip: Talk to the butler in your house to decorate the exterior of that house.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED116
string_tip.body: Tip: You can change the access authority or kick visitors out of your house through a butler.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED117
string_tip.body: Tip: The 'Homeward Bound' skill can be obtained by doing the introductory housing quest.\nGroup members can come through the portal with you to visit your home.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC076
string_tip.body: Tip: Select <Start Menu-Move to Channel/Beginner Server-Move to Beginner Server> to move to the beginner server.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED118
string_tip.body: Tip: The availability of items subject to the Abyss rank varies from the Abyss ranks.\nA change in the rank may disable the equip and use of the item you have been using.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC077
string_tip.body: Tip: Select <Start Menu-Additional Functions-Aion Powerbook> to use the Aion Powerbook the same way you use it from the homepage.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC078
string_tip.body: Tip: Click the 'Drawing Tool' on the lower side of the map window to write pictured memos on the map and share them with your party and Alliance members.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC079
string_tip.body: Tip: Go to <System Preferences-Game Preferences-Name> and select the 'Display Collection Item Names' to show the name of a collection item on the screen.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC080
string_tip.body: Tip: You can preview your appearance by pressing <Ctrl + clicking> the weapon, armour or wings.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC081
string_tip.body: Tip: You can change the location of a Transparent Map via the Move button on the upper side of the window.\nYou can also fix its position by clicking the Lock button on the left-hand side of the Quickbar.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED119
string_tip.body: Tip: Equipment crafted by a user has slightly better odds with enchantments than other equipment.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC049
string_tip.body: Hint: You can escape a situation in which you are stuck by entering the "/Quick Return" command.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC050
string_tip.body: Hint: Quest objects, coins and tickets are automatically stored in a special Cube. Click on the symbol below your inventory to open it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED120
string_tip.body: Hint: If you travel to the enemy camp via Portal Rift, you will not be punished for killing enemies belonging to the opposing faction.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED121
string_tip.body: Hint: There is a special NPC who exchanges items that are not available to buy.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC051
string_tip.body: Hint: The prices for purchasing and selling items may vary, depending on the NPC.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED122
string_tip.body: Hint: If you use two Enchantment Stones as a fusion tool, there is a chance that you might receive a higher level Enchantment Stone.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED123
string_tip.body: Hint: Enhance a weapon with Idian to add extra endurance attributes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED124
string_tip.body: Hint: You can extract more Enchantment Stones from items that have a high enchantment level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC062
string_tip.body: Hint: Press and hold the <Alt> key and use the scroll wheel to browse through the information pages for equipment items.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC064
string_tip.body: Hint: Press and hold <Alt> and move the cursor over the magnifying glass symbol on an equipment item to view information about it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED125
string_tip.body: Hint: The identification of equipment items generates additional random attributes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED126
string_tip.body: Hint: Re-identifying equipment items generates additional random attributes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC082
string_tip.body: Hint: Press <Tab> in the loot window to select the next item. Use the shortcut <Attack/Conversation/Pick up Item (C)> to pick up the selected item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC083
string_tip.body: Info: You can turn off the enemy warning feature in <Environment settings-Game settings-Pets>.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED132
string_tip.body: Hint: Ranks are awarded on the basis of the amount of Honour Points - starting at 1 Star Officer and going upwards.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED133
string_tip.body: Hint: Honour Points are deducted every day from players holding the rank of "1 Star Officer" or higher.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED134
string_tip.body: Hint: If you wrap a non-tradeable item, you can trade it one time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_ADVANCED135
string_tip.body: Hint: Merged two-handed weapons can be wrapped after a weapon is removed.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC084
string_tip.body: Tip: You can have the Master of Blessing bless your equipment to improve it. The items will retain their enhancements after the blessing.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC086
string_tip.body: Tip: To improve your equipment, enhance it with a blessing. The items will retain part of their enhancement levels as well as any socketed Godstones and Manastones after the blessing. Look for a Master of Blessing in the big cities.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_BASIC087
string_tip.body: Tip: Certain items can only be traded if the seller and buyer belong to the same Legion.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED001
string_tip.body: Tip: Legendary and Ultimate Enchantment Stones can also be purchased with Stellium using limited coupons.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED002
string_tip.body: Tip: The Abyss Rift which leads to Red Katalam opens at a random location in Lakrum and Dumaha each day between 9 AM and 5 PM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED003
string_tip.body: Tip: The Fortress Battle takes place simultaneously in the Abyss Core, Lakrum and Dumaha every Friday and Sunday at 10 PM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED004
string_tip.body: Tip: The Altar Siege Battle takes place in Dumaha daily at midday and 8:00 PM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED005
string_tip.body: Tip: If the Dumaha Altar is captured with Apsu's Blessing, you may receive a different reward than usual.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC001
string_tip.body: Tip: There are different ways to obtain Genesis Crystals. However, the main source is the quests which you can receive after capturing the Artefact Garrison in Lakrum.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC002
string_tip.body: Tip: In an extended battle, press SHIFT+F12 to activate minimal mode and improve game performance.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC003
string_tip.body: Tip: Repeatable quests which you receive when first playing an instance can be carried out twice a week. You will receive Enchantment Stones as a reward.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC004
string_tip.body: Tip: In the Orbis Training Arena in the Stellusia Underground you can enjoy PvP without any restrictions (like Soul Sickness).

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC005
string_tip.body: Tip: In Red Katalam, boxes show up in several places on the field which can be opened with keys for Legion boxes.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC006
string_tip.body: Tip: The 3 vs 3 Transformation Battlefield Illumiel can be entered every day between 11 AM and 3 PM and between 7 PM and 3 AM.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC007
string_tip.body: Tip: You can enter the Tower of Challenge through the lobby of the Empyrean Crucible.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED006
string_tip.body: Tip: The Item manual in the bottom part of your profile shows you your most valuable item and where you got it.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED007
string_tip.body: Tip: If you don't know what to do after level 76, press J to carry out Helper campaigns.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED008
string_tip.body: Tip: You can give Genesis Crystals to Genesis Crystal Traders in the major cities in Lakrum in return for equipment and Ancient Enchantment Stones.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED009
string_tip.body: Tip: Slot Stones are used to expand Manastone Slots. Fighting Spirit Fragments are used as upgrade material for upgrades.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC008
string_tip.body: Tip: Fusing 2 two-handed weapons improves the values and increases the number of Manastone Slots.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC009
string_tip.body: Tip: You can receive Slot Stones by extracting PvE equipment. You can receive Slot Stones and Fighting Spirit Fragments by extracting PvP equipment.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC010
string_tip.body: Tip: Press SHIFT+P to access magical crafting.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC011
string_tip.body: Tip: To link information on an item in a Chat, Ctrl-Right-Click the item.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC012
string_tip.body: Tip: To upgrade legendary equipment, you need ancient equipment with Enchantment Level +15 with all Manastone Slots activated.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC013
string_tip.body: Tip: Re-identification provides new option types and values, whereas Selection Re-identification only renews the values of the selected options.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC014
string_tip.body: Tip: Modify Appearance allows appearance skills to be applied to other equipment and used.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED010
string_tip.body: Tip: You receive additional effects in battle depending on the direction you move in. You can activate these combat movement buffs with the arrow on the screen.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED011
string_tip.body: Tip: Attributes obtained by Transformation Collection are applied to your character cumulatively.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED012
string_tip.body: Tip: Only the highest-level Collection skill is displayed.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_ADVANCED013
string_tip.body: Tip: 'Improved Daevanion Skill' can be boosted up to level 15.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC015
string_tip.body: Tip: Use Custom Skill Chains to deploy multiple skills in a row with one key.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC016
string_tip.body: Tip: If you successfully combine 4 minions with evolution level 4, you receive one random minion of a higher level.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC017
string_tip.body: Tip: When your icon on the Compass is red, you are at an altitude where you could die if you fall.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC018
string_tip.body: Tip: Daevanion Skill Books let you learn Daevanion Skills with far more powerful effects than your previous skills.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC019
string_tip.body: Tip: You can escape a situation in which you are stuck by entering the command '/Quick Return'.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC020
string_tip.body: Tip: Click on 'Drawing Tools' in the bottom right of the map to make notes and then share these with your companions.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC021
string_tip.body: Tip: Press N to activate the transparent world map. This lets you view the map and the game screen at the same time.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC022
string_tip.body: Tip: Enter /PathFinding NPC Name to locate NPCs.

string_tip.name: STR_TIP_CHAT_BASIC023
string_tip.body: Tip: Click on Inventory shop in the bottom part of the inventory to sell items without having to see an NPC.
